attributes.action: Make all young drivers(17-21 then 21-25) who pass a driving test be limited what engine size they can drive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: young drivers who pass a driving test can get behind fast cars with any engine size, i feel 17-21 year olds should be limited to 1000 size of engine and 21-25 be limited to 1400 for the first 3 years of driving or to a higher age what ever comes first. if 3 points are given in first year i feel the driver should be forced to sit young drivers awareness programme
